attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are currently just under 1000 Otter's in the UK, if we act now we could have the entire population wiped out within weeks!
For too long Otter's have strutted around on both land and water openly mocking the freedom's that aren't afforded to Seal's.
For too long Otter's have openly polluted our rivers with litter.
If we act now by this time next year beautiful Otter fur coats can adourn the aisles of our favourite high street fashion outlets.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
